title: loop hole in matchmaking makes for some really unbalanced games
body:
play a plat player add a gold 4 . Not ONLy if you are the duo you get to chose what role you want your duo to have you also get to have them in voice com! what did we get? top and mid instead of support gold player and they both feed down 100 cs because they have 50% win rates and dont belong. So what do we get as a result? They also had higher tier players with better win rates rofl. https://gyazo.com/e128c8b1bcdeb19e314d81b923abd95a

Oh yeah everyone except the gold 2 and gold 4 are fed while both feed and the mid heavy feeds. Dynamic que such a smart invention rofl

https://gyazo.com/7f5c63380985e03eb82f5e6f4d72271e  won the last 5 hard carried so they had to give me some boosted players so that I cant rank up :D its ok Ill have fun bodying these plat dip shits all day long.

replies.body:
This has nothing to do with DQ or matchmaking, looks like any normal game to me.

It looks like you making up excuses for loosing, instead of dealing with the fact you can improve.

You spend a lot of time crying on the forums, dont you?

yeah dude clearly at fault when uh I kinda carry every game with a 70% contribution while smurfing.

https://gyazo.com/84d94eab601d941c273fb15a5fecb476

what other plat player you see with these kdas and contribution? Hell this account was plat 4 with a near 70% win rate with d4 mmr so look into stuff before you use your almighty expertise there bud.

oh and youve been silver since season 4 so dont tell me you know how to play or anyone else how to play because you yourself have no idea whats going on in the game. My silver 1 friend tries to do the same and he stays that elo every season for a reason.
